prohibitive.translation[0].definitions[0: prohibitive costs are so high that they prevent people from buying or doing something
The cost of land in Tokyo is prohibitive.
prohibitive.translation[0].definitions[1: a prohibitive rule prevents people from doing things
prohibitive.translation[1].definitions[0: prohibitive costs, prices etc are very high, and people cannot afford them
Given the resources of small companies, marketingcosts can beprohibitive.
Disney started its own record label rather than pay a prohibitive price for an existing independent.
